selected_quotes: Which London mayoral candidate does most to make cycling mainstream? #LondonMayor2016
What Zac Goldsmith and Sadiq Khan's mayoral manifestos say about cycling: #LondonMayor2016
London desperately needs a mayor who will bring cycling into the mainstream #LondonMayor2016 ht…

citation.abstract: Cycling could be a major part of the solution to London's transport problems – it's a shame the main mayoral candidates don't see it that way.
citation.title: Which London mayoral candidate does most to make cycling mainstream?
